B

Ball - Class in com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites
Ball class that represents the moving ball on the screen.
Ball(int, int) - Constructor for class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.Ball
Ball constructor class that takes in an x-coordinate and y-coordinate representing the ball's initial position on the screen.
ballOut() - Method in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.Ball
Checks whether the ball has gone out of bounds.
Brick - Class in com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites
Brick class that represents the breakable bricks on the screen.
Brick(int, int, String) - Constructor for class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.Brick
Brick constructor class that takes in an X-coordinate, Y-coordinate, and a brickColor.
BrickBreaker - Class in com.skayani.brickbreaker
BrickBreaker class that initializes the GameStateManager and SpriteBatch class instances
BrickBreaker() - Constructor for class com.skayani.brickbreaker.BrickBreaker
 
BrickManager - Class in com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites
BrickManager class that handles each individual bricks status such as whether a brick has been hit or not.
BrickManager(GameStateManager, Ball, int) - Constructor for class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.BrickManager
BrickManager constructor that takes in a GameStateManager class instance, a Ball class instance, and a integer representing the game level.
bricksTable - Variable in class com.skayani.brickbreaker.sprites.BrickManager
